attributes.action: install a FULL TIME Minister for MOD Affairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the government response(7/1/08)to the petition re the Armed Forces Compensation Scheme and the comment that they(Govt.) take their responsibilities to serving personnel and veterans very seriously.In view of this comment,we urge the Prime Minister to replace the part time Minister for MOD Affairs with a dedicated FULL TIME Minister forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
